actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act (16 U.S.C. 1271-1287).

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a segment of the Dosewallips River and segments of the Bogachiel, Calawah, and Soleduck Tributaries of the Quillayute River in Washington as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System. Designates the entire Hoh River, a segment of the Dosewallips River, and a segment of the Quillayute River in Washington for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act (16 U.S.C. 1271-1287).
